appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Highlights rare English dictionary words and idioms on web pages. Facilitates English language learning and expands your vocabulary.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

tipInfo.message: To add a new expression to your vocabulary you can use mouse hover menu or browser context menu (select text + right click) or this input field:

disableDictLinks.message: Disable online dictionaries links in browser context menu

disableDictLinksInfo.message: Adding words to personal vocabulary will be easier: "Words Discoverer" context submenu will be replaced with a single "Add word" button. It is recommended to use this option if you have dedicated dictionary app.

enabledDescription.message: Highlight all Internet except "Skip List" sites.
